A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a jumbled mess. Rian Johnson went out of his way to make everything unexpected. And\, in doing so\, made everything make little sense. All that was teased in TFA was thrown out of the window. It's as if these two movies aren't connected. \nMoreover\, VERY little time was spent on Luke and Rey's story\, while way too much time was spent on the pointless Rose and Finn story.  \nA complete and total disappointment. The only saving grace is the Luke Skywalker scene at the end.  But\, overall\, the way Rian handled Luke Skywalker was a joke. We waited nearly 30 years to finally see an uber powerful Luke. Instead we got a completely out of character person who in NO way resembled Luke himself.
